member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS
member.summary: Specifies which formats are supported in the font, either at a font-wide level or per glyph.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_NONE
member.summary: Indicates no data is available for this glyph.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_COLR
member.summary: The glyph has multilayered COLR data.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_SVG
member.summary: The glyph has SVG outlines as standard XML. Fonts may store the content gzip'd rather than plain text, indicated by the first two bytes as gzip header {0x1F 0x8B}.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PNG
member.summary: The glyph has PNG image data, with standard PNG IHDR.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_JPEG
member.summary: The glyph has JPEG image data, with standard JIFF SOI header.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_TIFF
member.summary: The glyph has TIFF image data.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS.DWRITE_GLYPH_IMAGE_FORMATS_PREMULTIPLIED_B8G8R8A8
member.summary: The glyph has raw 32-bit premultiplied BGRA data.
